Description: PLEASE CLICK HERE TO SEE FULL ITEM DESCRIPTION Description Series: Seamaster Jacques Mayol 1998 Limited Edition Model #: 2586.70 Gender: Ladies / Womens Case/Band: Stainless steel Dial: Green (super rare dial color) Crystal: Sapphire Case size: 26MM Total circumference: 6.5" (this is a pretty good size, but if you need larger please e-mail me for price/availability of additional links) Overall condition: Looks brand new. Sapphire crystal is flawless. Dial/hands are perfect. Bezel shines like new. Crown screws down perfectly. Bracelet shows no wear, has the original brushed/polished finishes, etc. You would have to look to the inside surfaces (the unseen parts like the inside of the band, caseback, etc.) to find any evidence of use whatsoever (and even then you won't see much). All top/outside surfaces look new. All functions have been tested and work perfectly.  This is limited edition # 1924 of 2500 made.   Click here to view the WRISTWATCHTRADER EBAY STORE   Sizing: Occasionally good fortune will shine upon us and the timepiece will fit perfectly upon arrival.  However, for the majority of cases we will need to add/remove links for desired fit.  For more info about how to obtain expansion links, please do not hesitate to contact me and I'll be happy to help. Return Policy: I bend over backwards to ship only the highest quality items (please see my buyer reviews below).  In the rare case of a bonafide defect please contact me immediately so that we can work towards a solution.     In order to provide you with the widest possible selection of timepieces, I do not ship items on a "try on" basis.  I appreciate your cooperation.   If you haven't already, please take the time to read my buyer reviews (9000+ over 15 years), which can be found here:   WRISTWATCHTRADER BUYER REVIEWS Pictures sell!
